paper_abstract: We give efficient deterministic distributed algorithms which given a graph G from a proper minor-closed family C find an approximation of a minimum dominating set in G and a minimum connected dominating set in G. The algorithms are deterministic and run in a polylogarithmic number of rounds. The approximation accomplished differs from an optimal by a multiplicative factor of (1 + o(1)).
paper_title: Distributed almost exact approximations for minor-closed families
